title: Germany intervenes in Spanish Civil War

content.prompt: The ideology represented in the image had which of the following effects on neighboring Spain?

choices.label: Spanish industrialization lagged behind that of the rest of western Europe.
Spain lost its remaining colonies in the Americas.
Germany and Italy intervened in the Spanish Civil War.
Spain joined the NATO alliance after the Second World War.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
